evaluation_prompt:
Evaluate the code review response based on the following criteria:
1. Code Quality Analysis: Assessment of code structure and organization
2. Best Practices: Identification of adherence to or deviation from best practices
3. Actionable Feedback: Specific, implementable suggestions for improvement
4. Technical Accuracy: Correctness of technical observations and recommendations

code_quality_analysis.description: Depth and insight in analyzing code structure and organization

best_practices.description: Identification and analysis of best practices

metadata.notes: Focus on practical improvements and technical accuracy
